Entries.Introduction: Oh! Is this @? I'm Jodi.#$e#Did you get my little care package? I hope it's enough to get you started.#$e#Oh don't look so embarassed, that old farm is very exciting! I wouldn't want our new little farmer caught unprepared when he gets a little distracted.$1^Oh don't look so embarassed, a new farm is very exciting! I wouldn't want our new little farmer caught unprepared when she gets a little distracted.
Entries.Resort_Leaving: I think I'll make seafood tonight.$h
Entries.Resort: The view is breathtaking! Deep blue as far as the eye can see...
Entries.Resort_Bar: We all love it when Gus shows up.
Entries.reject_864: What's this? It looks like one of Kent's buddies from the war. Maybe you should show it to him?
Entries.Mon: Maintaining a household is difficult work... but somebody has to do it.#$e#Yes?
Entries.Mon6: It's nice to have a family... but I'd be lying if I said I never miss the freedom of being young...$s
Entries.2_1: My husband Kent is a soldier, working overseas. That's why he's not here right now.#$b#I know he'll come back safe once his tour is over!!#$e#Need something?
Entries.Tue: Exercise is important for staying healthy. I always make sure to set aside some time for it.#$e#As a parent, I don't have much time to devote to myself. So I try and make every minute count.
Entries.Wed4: I wish I could spend more time outside, but there's so much work to do.#$e#I started wearing rubber gloves to keep my hands soft.#$e#The older you get, the more work you have to do to stay healthy.$s#$e#Ok, bye!
Entries.Wed: What did you say? It's %time already? My goodness!#$e#I still have tons of work to do!$s
Entries.Thu6: Where does all the time go? *sigh*#$e#I remember when Sam was a little baby wearing diapers. He was such a cute little kid.$s#$e#Don't tell him I said that.$h#$e#You must really like talking to me, huh?
Entries.Thu: So you're a farmer, huh? Interesting.#$c .5#I've never met a farmer before.$k#$e#Maybe some day you can teach me how to grow vegetables.$h
Entries.Fri: $d Joja#The food at JojaMart might not be the healthiest for my family, but with such low prices you'd be crazy to shop anywhere else!|The food at Pierre's is so much fresher and healthier than anything I ever bought at JojaMart. I do miss those cheap Joja prices, though.
Entries.Sat4: I'm so glad you're trying to improve that old farm.#$e#Once you've got everything in order, it's going to add a lot to our community!$h#$e#It's going to be a lot of work for you, though.#$e#Bye.
Entries.Mon2: $d kent#Yesterday I visited Yoba's Altar to give thanks for my husband's safe return.|Yesterday I visited Yoba's Altar to ask for my husband's safe return.#$e#I'm trying to stay positive, but it's hard sometimes.$s
Entries.Sun: #$c .5#I'm taking a break from house chores today.$h#$e#I'm taking the day off.$h#$e#If I don't spend any time outside, I'll go crazy!#$e#Plus I don't want my legs to turn soft.
Entries.Sun8: I had a dream that I had complete freedom, no obligation to anyone but myself...#$b#...Then I woke up and realized I had a full day of house chores ahead of me...$s#$e#But I don't regret having a family, @... Sam and Vincent mean everything to me!
Entries.spring_Mon: There's the little farmer!#$e#How's the town treating you?
Entries.spring_Mon6: There's the little farmer!#$b#%Jodi pulls the back your waist band for a quick check.#$e#You should be okay for now.
Entries.spring_Tue4: #$c .5#Do you have any animals on your farm? Can you tell me what the cow says?#$e#That's right! Cow goes moo!$1|Do you have any animals on your farm? Can you tell me what the chicken says?#$e#That's right! Chicken goes cluck cluck!$1
Entries.spring_Wed2: Would you like to tell me all about your farm?#$e#%Jodi smiles at you while you gush about how pretty your farm is.#$e#What a clever little boy you are.$1^What a clever little girl you are.$1
Entries.spring_Wed8: Would you like to tell me all about your farm?#$e#%Jodi smiles at you while you gush about how pretty your farm is. You barely even notice her hand check to see if your pants are still dry.#$e#What a clever little boy you are.$1^What a clever little girl you are.$1
Entries.spring_Thu2: Sam still sleeps with his old teddy bear, though, he tries to hide it in the morning.#$e#I don't know what to say to make him feel less embarassed about it.$2
Entries.spring_Fri: How are you doing @? Are you eating enough?#$e#...Do you have enough... supplies?
Entries.spring_Fri4: How are you doing @? Are you eating enough?#$e#I bet you've already run out of the diapers I gave you by now.#$e#I sure hope your farm is making enough money to buy more!$1#$e#
Entries.spring_Sat4: #$p 102#I'm so glad you're trying to improve that old farm.|Vincent fell asleep on my lap yesterday.#$e#It was so precious, I never wanted it to end!$1
Entries.spring_Sun6: Being motherly makes me feel important.#$b#Even if the little ones aren't my own!$1#$e#%Jodi gives you a wink.
Entries.summer_Mon: Summer is nice, but it also means more work.#$e#I'll have to keep the garden in shape on top of working in the house!
Entries.summer_Tue: Hello.#$e#Do you need something? I'm a little busy.
Entries.summer_Tue_inlaw_Sam: How's my little Sammy doing on the old farm?$h
Entries.summer_Thu: Housework is frustrating because you're never finished.#$e#The day after I sweep the floor, it's dirty again.
Entries.summer_Sun: What in the world am I going to make for dinner?#$e#*sigh*...
Entries.summer_Mon6: %Jodi sees you standing nearby and holds out her hand. You grab onto her sleeve and smile up at her.#$e#Awwwww.
Entries.summer_Mon10: %Jodi sees you standing nearby and holds out her hand. You grab onto her sleeve as your thumb finds its way into your mouth without you noticing.#$e#Awwwww. Well aren't you a precious little boy.^Well aren't you a precious little girl.$1
Entries.summer_Tue6: #$p 102#Sam tries really hard to act like a big kid, but he still melts when I pet his hair just like when he was a little boy.|Sometimes I catch Sam watching me change Vincent.#$e#He almost looks jealous.$1
Entries.summer_Wed8:
Oh hi there @!#$q 110/111 Show_Followup#Oh, do you want to show me something?
#$r 110 0 Show_Nice#Show her the pretty flower you picked.
#$r 110 0 Show_Nice#Show her the cool rock you found in the mines.
#$r 110 0 Show_Nice#Show her your favorite plushie.
#$r 111 0 Show_Diaper#Show her your diaper.
Entries.Show_Nice: %Jodi holds it delicately, looking at it like it's the most important thing in the world.#$b#This is wonderful! Thank you for showing me.$1#$b#%Jodi gives it back and pats your head affectionately.
Entries.Show_Diaper: %Jodi grins at your proud display.#$b#Well isn't that something!$1#$b#Let's see if it's still clean.#$b#%Jodi presses her hand against your diaper, giving it a thorough check.
Entries.Show_Followup: Well don't you look excited!$1#$e#%Jodi pats your head fondly.
Entries.summer_Thu4: That farm seems like a lot of work for such a little farmer! I guess you're only pretending to be so little.#$e#%Jodi winks at you.
Entries.summer_Fri8: #$p 102#Maintaining a household is difficult work... but somebody has to do it.|Vincent doesn't show any signs of getting out of diapers any time soon.#$e#I guess he'll just be my little boy for a little bit longer.$1
Entries.summer_Sat: %Jodi is humming a soft song to herself while she goes about her business. It's familiar somehow.
Entries.summer_Sat10: %Jodi is humming a soft song to herself while she goes about her business. It's familiar somehow.#$e#%She notices you paying attention and smiles. Without stopping her hum, she pulls you into a hug, letting you feel the comforting hum in her chest.#$e#Looks like someone might need a nap.
Entries.summer_Sun6: Oh no! @! Is that a boo boo on your finger? What happened?$2#$b#%You tell Jodi about hurting your finger on the farm with tears in your eyes while she puts on a bandaid for you. She gives it a kiss for good measure.#$e#There we go, all better. Have fun playing!
Entries.summer_Sun10: Oh no! @! Is that a boo boo on your finger? What happened?$2#$b#%You tell Jodi about hurting your finger on the farm with tears in your eyes while she puts on a bandaid for you.#$b#She gives it a kiss for good measure before patting your bottom to send you away.#$e#There we go, all better. Have fun playing!
Entries.fall_Thu: Maybe I've spoiled the boys a bit. They've never had to do any chores.#$e#I guess I want them to be able to enjoy their childhood while they still can. Well, Sam's basically a man now, though.#$b#I hope he hasn't grow up to be lazy. That won't do.$s#$e#Being a parent isn't very easy.
Entries.fall_Thu_inlaw_Sam: Is Sam just bumming around the farm, or is he contributing?
Entries.fall_Sun: Caroline and I are good friends. I tell her everything.
Entries.fall_Sun2: When you become a parent, you have to leave your old lifestyle behind.#$e#Maybe that's not entirely true... but if you're not careful, it will happen.
Entries.fall_Mon2: #$p 102#There's the little farmer!|Sam doesn't think I notice that Vincent's diapers run out faster than they should.#$e#I guess I still have two little boys, don't I!$1
Entries.fall_Tue4: #$c .5#Do you have any animals on your farm? Can you tell me what the dog says?#$e#That's right! Dog says bark!$1|Do you have any animals on your farm? Can you tell me what the cat says?#$e#That's right! Cat says meow!$1
Entries.fall_Wed8: If you ever need help with one of your little accidents, don't be afraid to ask, okay?#$e#You're so cute when you're blushing!$1
Entries.fall_Thu2: Are you hungry?#$b#%Jodi pulls out a granola bar for you and smiles warmly as you take it.#$e#That should hold you over for now.
Entries.fall_Fri2: #$p 102#I bet you've already run out of the diapers I gave you by now.|I guess I'd have less work to do if Vincent was potty trained.#$e#At least boys are easy to clean.
Entries.fall_Sat: There's the little farmer!#$e#How's the town treating you?
Entries.fall_Sat8: There's the little farmer!#$b#%Jodi pulls the back your waist band for a quick check.#$e#You should be okay for now.
Entries.fall_Sun6: Being motherly makes me feel important.#$b#Even if the little ones aren't my own!$1#$e#%Jodi gives you a wink.
Entries.winter_Mon: I loved playing in the snow when I was a kid. The great thing about being a mother is that I get to enjoy it again.$h
Entries.winter_Tue: Hi. Do you get tired of people asking about your farm all the time?#$e#I think I would.
Entries.winter_Tue6: *sigh*... Sometimes I dream about life on my own... without a family to look after. Is that horrible?$s#$e#Don't tell anyone.$4
Entries.winter_Wed2: What do I do for fun? Hmm... That's a good question.#$e#I like sleeping.$s
Entries.winter_Wed4_2: Kent has been home for a while now, but he still seems uneasy.$s
Entries.winter_Thu: Sam makes a lot of noise with that music of his. I hope it doesn't disturb the neighbors.
Entries.winter_Thu_inlaw_Sam: How's Sam doing? I have to admit, there's less cooking and cleaning to do since he moved out...
Entries.winter_Fri: It would be nice to take a vacation once in a while...$s
Entries.winter_Sun: If I was rich the first thing I'd do would be to hire a maid and a chef.#$e#My goodness, that would be nice!$h
Entries.winter_Mon10: %Jodi is humming a soft song to herself while she goes about her business. It's familiar somehow.#$e#%She notices you paying attention and smiles. Without stopping her hum, she pulls you into a hug, letting you feel the comforting hum in her chest.#$e#Looks like someone might need a nap.
Entries.winter_Tue10: %Jodi sees you standing nearby and holds out her hand. You grab onto her sleeve as your thumb finds its way into your mouth without you noticing.#$e#Awwwww. Well aren't you a precious little boy.^Well aren't you a precious little girl.$1
Entries.winter_Wed6: Oh no! @! Is that a boo boo on your finger? What happened?$2#$b#%You tell Jodi about hurting your finger on the farm with tears in your eyes while she puts on a bandaid for you. She gives it a kiss for good measure.#$e#There we go, all better. Have fun playing!
Entries.winter_Wed10: Oh no! @! Is that a boo boo on your finger? What happened?$2#$b#%You tell Jodi about hurting your finger on the farm with tears in your eyes while she puts on a bandaid for you.#$b#She gives it a kiss for good measure before patting your bottom to send you away.#$e#There we go, all better. Have fun playing!
Entries.winter_Thu4: Sam tries really hard to act like a big kid, but he still melts when I pet his hair just like when he was a little boy.#$e#It feels nice to know he trusts me enough to let his guard down.#$e#It makes me feel like a good mother.$1
Entries.winter_Fri2: You're a good boy. You know that, right?^You're a good girl. You know that, right?
Entries.winter_Sat6: Maybe I should push Vincent to use the potty more, but I don't want him to feel ashamed about himself.$2#$e#He just looks so carefree playing in his diapers too. I don't want to take that away from him.
Entries.winter_Sun6: %Jodi sees you standing nearby and holds out her hand. You grab onto her sleeve and smile up at her.#$e#Awwwww.
Entries.winter_Sun10: %Jodi sees you standing nearby and holds out her hand. You grab onto her sleeve as your thumb finds its way into your mouth without you noticing.#$e#Awwwww. Well aren't you a precious little boy.^Well aren't you a precious little girl.$1
